South Giziga bụ asụsụ Afro-Asia nke a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu Cameroon
Asụsụ ndị a bụ Mi Mijivin, Muturami, na Rum.

A na-asụ South Giziga (ndị na-ekwu okwu 60,000) n'ebe ndịda Maroua na ndagwurugwu Diamaré gburugburu obere massifs nke Loutou, Moutourwa, Midjivin, wdg (na ngalaba Diamaré, Maroua commune na ngalaba Mayo-Kani, obodo nke Mindif, Kaélé, na Moutourwa)
